about_the_game:
Dive into the world of ERZ Online – a groundbreaking MMO sandbox where your strategy shapes the future!

Take control of advanced mining robots to explore alien planets filled with rare resources. Build sprawling underground bases, automate complex tasks through innovative programming, and craft intricate equipment to dominate your environment.

Engage in a dynamic player-driven economy, trade your resources on the open market, and compete or ally with others in a universe governed by politics and evolving technologies. ERZ Online offers the freedom to play your way, whether it's as a lone explorer, a master programmer, or the leader of a powerful mining clan.

Key Features:

  • Procedurally Generated Worlds: Unique planets brimming with challenges and treasures.

  • Automation and Programming: Create custom scripts to automate your robots and streamline your operations.

  • Base Building and Territory Defense: Construct and fortify your own bases to protect your resources.

  • Player-Driven Economy: Trade resources, craft gear, and manage your market strategies.

  • Clan Warfare and Politics: Form alliances, defend your territory, and influence the game’s political landscape.

Experience the ultimate blend of creativity, strategy, and adventure in ERZ Online. Your mining empire awaits!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-4440 CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DirectX 11 support or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-8700 CPU
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DirectX 11 support or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: ERZ Online is a futuristic MMO sandbox where you command mining robots, explore procedural planets, and build underground bases. Automate tasks with programming, trade in a player-driven economy, and shape the world through alliances, politics, and competition. Your mining empire awaits!
